EmailTemplate.subject: Unrestricted access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I work for Compliance Week, the leading information service on corporate compliance. As Acritas Research Ltd currently doesn’t have access to our service, I invite you to join.
Of the 50 largest law firms in the US, 28 are subscribers—including Baker & McKenzie, DLA Piper, Latham & Watkins, and White & Case. Hundreds of attorneys and the majority of Fortune 1000 companies rely on us to keep them well informed.
Still not sure? We offer a free 10-day no-obligation trial. Just send me a quick note and I’d be happy to set you up with access.
Please feel free to call or e-mail with any questions.
Thanks!
